IPL 2026: R Ashwin leaves out CSK from his top four, fourth pick comes as surprise
description: Ravichandran Ashwin has revealed his top four IPL contenders, notably excluding his former team Chennai Super Kings. He placed Mumbai Indians at the forefront, followed by defending champions Royal Challengers Bengaluru, Punjab Kings, and Rajasthan Royals. Ashwin lauded Mumbai Indians' strategic acquisition of Quinton de Kock, believing they are aiming to replicate their 2020 championship squad's balance.

title: Research scientist says this method is the safest path to lasting weight loss: ‘There is no other way’
Canadian-Sikh lawyer who refused to swear oath to King Charles – got the law changed
description: A Sikh lawyer successfully challenged Alberta's mandatory oath of allegiance to the King, securing a landmark ruling. The Alberta Court of Appeal declared the requirement a violation of religious freedom under the Charter. This decision brings the province in line with others, allowing for alternative affirmations and upholding Canada's pluralistic society.

title: India vs South Africa: Why Varun Chakaravarthy, Arshdeep Singh, Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav all cannot be in the same eleven
Annamalai arrested: TN cops say no permit for anti-garbage stir; BJP condemns action
description: Tamil Nadu police detained former BJP state president K Annamalai and party workers protesting against the dumping of waste from Tiruppur city in Chinnakalipalayam village. The BJP criticized the arrest, calling it a condemnable act by the Stalin government for supporting local residents.

title: Inside Josh Allen’s luxury car collection: A look at the Bills star’s garage
description: Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen's impressive car collection showcases his journey from humble beginnings to NFL stardom. His garage features a mix of rugged trucks like the Ford F-150 Raptor and luxury SUVs such as the Jeep Grand Wagoneer and Range Rover Sport, reflecting his need for utility and comfort in Buffalo's climate.

title: ‘With knowledge but without intention’: Telangana HC reverses murder verdict of man who killed wife while drunk

'Violent act' foiled in Australia: 7 held in Sydney; PM vows to stamp out hatred
description: Sydney police thwarted a potential violent act on Thursday, arresting seven men in the city's southwest following a tip-off. While the investigation is ongoing, authorities have found no link to the recent Bondi Beach antisemitic shooting. Footage showed officers intercepting vehicles and detaining suspects.

title: Who is Maharashtra minister Manikrao Kokate, earlier caught in ‘rummy row’ and now convicted in forgery case?

Ishan Kishan sends message to India selectors with SMAT performance
description: Ishan Kishan smashed a brilliant 101 off 47 balls in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy Elite 2025 final. His innings helped Jharkhand reach 180 for 1 in 14 overs against Haryana. Kishan finished as the tournament's top scorer. He partnered with Kumar Kushagra for an unbeaten 177-run stand. Jharkhand secured a dominant position in the match.

title: 15 years on, Uttarakhand HC upholds life term for husband who cut wife into 72 pieces
description: Fifteen years after a software engineer murdered his wife, dismembered her body, and disposed of the remains, the Uttarakhand High Court has upheld his life imprisonment. The brutal crime, which occurred in October 2010, came to light when the victim's brother filed a missing complaint, leading to the discovery of body parts and the engineer's arrest.

NCP minister quits: Convicted in fraud case; CM Fadnavis accepts resignation
description: Maharashtra minister Manikrao Kokate resigned after a court issued arrest warrants in a 1995 housing quota case. Deputy CM  Ajit Pawar accepted the resignation in principle, forwarding it to CM Devendra Fadnavis.  The Governor has now allocated Kokate's former ministries to Pawar. This follows a similar incident with another NCP politician.

Exodus: Over 2L Indians renouncing citizenship every year; why are they leaving?
description: Nearly a million Indians have renounced their citizenship in five years, with over two lakh annually since 2022. This trend, raises questions about quality of life, governance, and taxation. While the government cites personal reasons and views the diaspora as an asset, the lack of dual citizenship is a key factor driving this significant outflow.

BCCI not responsible for Lucknow T20I ticket refunds: Secretary Saikia
description: Spectators of the abandoned India-South Africa T20I in Lucknow will receive refunds, confirmed BCCI Secretary Devajit Saikia. The Uttar Pradesh Cricket Association (UPCA) will manage reimbursements for the match called off due to dense fog and poor visibility. Saikia highlighted the unpredictable nature of winter weather, noting this was an exceptional situation despite BCCI's efforts to reschedule domestic games.

description: India's job market is rapidly evolving by 2026, prioritizing skills and digital fluency over tenure. Technology-led roles in data science, AI, and cloud computing are booming, alongside growth in green infrastructure, quick commerce, and precision manufacturing. High paychecks are increasingly linked to specialized digital capabilities and niche technical certifications.

Ex-Sabres GM Kevyn Adams leaks confidential contract negotiation details
description: Former Buffalo Sabres general manager Kevyn Adams has sparked fresh NHL controversy. Especially after publicly discussing confidential contract negotiations. That involves forward Alex Tuch. The unexpected disclosure has raised questions around ethics. And player leverage, and Buffalo’s long-term strategy. Mostly, as the franchise approaches a critical trade deadline amid continued playoff struggles.

title: Anti-India protests in B'desh: Two visa centres closed; rally at consulate - key points
description: India's Dhaka visa application centre has reopened after a temporary closure due to an anti-India protest. However, centres in Khulna and Rajshahi remain shut due to security concerns. India has expressed strong concern to Bangladesh over the deteriorating security environment around its mission.

description: Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) has rejected Paramount Skydance's $108 billion hostile takeover bid, deeming it "misleading" and "inadequate." WBD's board urged shareholders to reject the offer, citing financial concerns and a lack of a personal guarantee from Larry Ellison. The company reiterated its preference for a merger agreement with Netflix, which it considers superior and more transparent.

Arjun Rampal reacts to Preity Zinta’s Dhurandhar praise
description: Arjun Rampal praised Preity Zinta’s passion for 'Dhurandhar', saying her excitement inspired him deeply. The actor thanked her on Instagram, expressing gratitude for her constant support. Preity, after watching the film, called it “raw, real, and powerful,” hailing Aditya Dhar’s direction and the performances of Ranveer Singh, Akshaye Khanna, Rampal, and others.

Ghaziabad horror: Landlady goes to collect rent; her body found inside suitcase
description: A Ghaziabad woman was tragically found dead in a suitcase under a bed in her rented flat. She had reportedly gone to collect overdue rent from her tenants, a couple who have since been detained. The discovery was made by her domestic help after the victim failed to return home. Police are investigating the motive and cause of death.

title: Juice cleanses, fasting don’t work: 5 habits that truly detox liver & gut
description: Forget quick fixes; true liver and gut detox hinges on sustainable lifestyle choices. Experts highlight that excess sugars, refined carbs and sedentary habits stress these vital organs. Embracing a balanced diet, consistent physical activity and a healthy gut microbiome are key. Managing underlying metabolic diseases and considering personalised genomic insights further bolster the body's natural cleansing power for long-term well-being.

title: Braun Strowman & Raquel Rodriguez net worth 2025: WWE earnings, lifestyle
description: Braun Strowman and Raquel Rodriguez showcase contrasting WWE financial journeys in 2025. Strowman, a former headliner, boasts an estimated net worth of $2-5 million, built on lucrative deals and merchandise. Rodriguez, a rising star, has a projected $700,000, with her value steadily increasing through television exposure and championship opportunities.

title: How police secretly tracked missing coach Travis Turner before abuse charges
description: Experts believe fugitive football coach Travis Turner was likely caught through a secret police sting or flagged online activity. Authorities say Turner faces 10 child pornography-related charges. While police remain silent, criminologists told the Daily Mail that undercover officers, tech company reports, or device searches likely led to the case.

title: Amazon layoffs: Biggest ever job cuts in Europe; these roles are impacted the most
description: Amazon is cutting 370 jobs, or 8.5% of its Luxembourg workforce, impacting software developers as the company embraces AI. This reduction follows a global layoff of 14,000 employees and comes after negotiations resulted in a reduced number from the initial plan. Despite the cuts, Amazon reaffirms Luxembourg as a strategic European partner.

title: Gisele Bündchen stuns on Florida jet ski date as ex-Tom Brady fuels NFL comeback talk
description: Gisele Bündchen and Joaquim Valente embraced a sun-drenched holiday with a jet ski outing near their Florida home, prioritizing family and privacy after welcoming their son. This choice reflects Bündchen's current focus on grounding moments and personal strength over public spectacle. Meanwhile, Tom Brady confirmed his NFL retirement is permanent due to his ownership stake in the Raiders.
